name: Hyperblast!
overview: Hyperblast! is a 1 - 2 player arcade game for the 8-bit Atari. The player controls a spaceship which moves laterally on the bottom of the screen, and fires directly forwards. Six enemy vessels appear on the screen, and fire towards the player. After destroying 7 waves of alien vessels, the player blasts off to fight 7 rounds of a more difficult alien vessel. If the player is hit, they lose a ship.
